universe_note: Ranked only the provided packets. Liquidity gate applied: avg_dollar_volume_20d >= 50,000,000 and price >= 2. Exclusions requiring 5-day % move and dated earnings/catalyst checks could not be fully enforced because packets do not include 5-day return and most catalysts lack confirmed event dates/times; such gaps are reflected in factor caps and data_gaps.

top5.name: Warner Bros. Discovery, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: M&A headline fades/denied or legal overhang escalates (Paramount lawsuit/proxy fight), causing reversal below short-term moving averages.

primary_catalyst.title: M&A headline: reported Netflix all-cash bid / bid structure update
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: A credible strategic-buyer bid (and any confirmation/terms updates) can rapidly reprice WBD given high liquidity and proximity to 52-week highs; follow-on newsflow can drive a >10% move within days.

sources.title: Netflix Stock Pops on Report of All-Cash Bid for Warner Bros.
Netflix may adjust WBD bid to an all-cash offer: Bloomberg

risk_factors: M&A is unconfirmed; reversal risk if denied or terms disappoint.
Legal/proxy fight headlines (Paramount lawsuit) can add volatility and downside gaps.

No confirmed scheduled catalyst date/time beyond headlines; catalyst score reflects headline credibility but not a scheduled event.

top5.name: Murphy Oil Corporation

target.bear_case_note: Oil macro reverses or discovery narrative is walked back; stock loses momentum and breaks below short-term moving averages.

primary_catalyst.title: Major oil discovery offshore Vietnam (follow-on details/coverage)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: A confirmed 'significant' discovery can change NAV expectations and trigger estimate revisions; continued newsflow and analyst follow-ups can extend momentum over the next week.

sources.title: Murphy Oil Makes Southeast Asia’s Largest Oil Discovery in 20 Years
Murphy Oil Confirms 'Significant' Oil Discovery offshore Vietnam

risk_factors: Commodity beta: oil price drawdowns can overwhelm company-specific news.
Discovery appraisal/timing uncertainty; market may demand more data before repricing.

top5.name: Transocean Ltd.

target.bear_case_note: Contract/backlog optimism fades or macro risk-off hits high-leverage offshore drillers; breakdown below short-term MAs.

primary_catalyst.title: New rig contracts/extensions add $168M to backlog (Brazil & Norway)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Backlog additions support cash-flow visibility and can drive rapid re-rating in leveraged offshore drillers; follow-through coverage can extend the move within a week.

sources.title: Transocean's New Deals in Brazil & Norway Add $168M to Firm Backlog
Transocean secures Mykonos contract, Enabler extension worth $168m backlog

risk_factors: High leverage/industry cyclicality; offshore drillers can gap on oil and credit spreads.
Potential 'already priced' risk given headlines about large recent multi-month gains.

top5.name: Protagonist Therapeutics, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Regulatory filing/approval path becomes uncertain or market interprets FDA submission as already priced; biotech risk-off leads to sharp pullback.

primary_catalyst.title: Regulatory: Takeda and Protagonist seek FDA approval for rusfertide (PV)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: FDA submission/approval-seeking milestones can trigger near-term repricing and follow-on analyst updates; biotech names can move >10% quickly on regulatory progress.

sources.title: Takeda and Protagonist seek FDA approval for rusfertide to treat PV
Alumis Stock Catapults More Than 95% As Biotech Takes On J&J, Protagonist In Psoriasis

risk_factors: Binary/regulatory headline risk; biotech can gap both directions.
Sector correlation: broader biotech risk-off can negate company-specific progress.

top5.name: TTM Technologies, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Conference expectations disappoint (no incremental guidance/news) and the stock fails to hold above short-term moving averages.

primary_catalyst.title: Conference spotlight: investor focus ahead of Needham Growth Conference
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Conference participation can drive near-term newsflow (customer/AI-defense positioning updates) and multiple expansion; TTMI’s high realized vol supports a ≥10% move if messaging surprises.

Is TTM Technologies' (TTMI) Community-Focused PCB Expansion Quietly Redefining Its AI and Defense Positioning?

risk_factors: Catalyst timing is not confirmed (conference date/time not provided); may reduce near-term impact.
High volatility can cut both ways; sharp drawdowns possible if AI/defense narrative cools.
